Title: Information Technology Technical Lead
Full Job Description:
At Jabil we strive to make ANYTHING POSSIBLE and EVERYTHING BETTER. We are proud to be a trusted partner for the world's top brands, offering comprehensive engineering, manufacturing, and supply chain solutions. With over 50 years of experience across industries and a vast network of over 100 sites worldwide, Jabil combines global reach with local expertise to deliver both scalable and customized solutions. Our commitment extends beyond business success as we strive to build sustainable processes that minimize environmental impact and foster vibrant and diverse communities around the globe.
JOB SUMMARY
Responsible for overall functional design and solution architecture as it relates to SAP solutions and those solutions tightly integrated or coupled with SAP.
ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
- Assume the role of SAP Technical Lead on complex and enterprise projects.
- Work with SAP along with internal and external partners to solution design/architect appropriate solutions that ensure Jabil's requirements are met.
- Adopt existing and available solution designs to meet new business requirements.
- Provide guidance on alternative solutions available by researching and understanding options available via SAP applications, their preferred partners, and other parties.
- Ability to work with all areas of IT and operations in an open and collaborative fashion - promoting a sense of common destiny.
- Ability to give and receive feedback in an unbiased manner, thus promoting the goals and objectives of the organization.
- Ability to take complex requirements and summarize the requirements via common business vernacular.
- Ability to make unbiased decisions after evaluating the pros and cons of multiple alternatives and then articulate the proposed solution in both technical and non-technical terminology.
- Ability to understand and explain the configuration options available within our systems.
- Provide insight, alternatives, and direction on how to improve Jabil's operational and financial performance by better leveraging our system capabilities.
- Ability to understand multiple functional areas of SAP and the integration between those functional areas.
- Ability to write highly detailed position papers expressing and supporting the architectural solution being proposed.
- Ability to provide flow diagrams, entity relationships, mapping and table definitions for advanced design concept.
- Actively participate in the exchanging of ideas and information within the department and with the extended business community.
- Challenge fellow architects in order to ensure well thought out proposals are being presented.
- Demonstrate a commitment to customer service; anticipate, meet and exceed expectations by solving problems quickly and effectively; making customer issues a priority.
- Confer with reporting manager on complex or unusual situations.
- Exchange knowledge and information with other Jabil facilities to ensure best practices are shared throughout the Jabil organization.
- Ensure 100% adherence to all company policies and procedures (i.e. Health, Safety and Quality).
- Maintain discretion and confidentiality in all areas pertaining to data and proprietary information, whether internal to Jabil or customer specific.
- Interpret a variety of instructions furnished in written, oral, diagram or schedule form.
- Maintain discretion and confidentiality in all areas pertaining to the IT systems.
- Understand and embrace the business and IT strategic direction.
JOB QUALIFICATIONS
KNOWLEDGE REQUIREMENTS
·         Proven proficiency across multiple disciplines and or technologies.
·         Fluent in business processes and best practices.
·         Advanced PC skills, including training and knowledge of Jabil’s software packages.
·         Ability to effectively present information in one-on-one and small group situations to customers, clients, and other employees of the organization.
·         Demonstrated functional/technical leadership experience.
·         Project management training.
·         Strong communication and interpersonal skills to include excellent written and verbal communication skills, and proven ability to work with the customer, management and technical teams in a “self starter” role.
·         Strong attention to detail.
EDUCATION & EXPERIENCE REQUIREMENTS
Bachelor’s degree required.
Post-graduate degree in Engineering, Computer Science, Management Information Systems, or equivalent experience expected.
Minimum 8 years of experience in related discipline.
Or, equivalent combination of education, training, or experience.
Minimum of 6-8 years of work-related experience required, preferably in business/manufacturing systems.
Functional expertise in the SAP FICO module is required.
Extensive cross-module knowledge in SAP is essential.
Experience working in complex global SAP environments is a must.
Experience in multiple full SAP implementations and SAP integration, including design, solutioning, configuration, integration, testing, and training, is essential.
Experience with all stages of developing custom SAP applications is required, including requirement gathering, creating functional specifications, design, coordinating development, testing, and user acceptance testing.
Experience in designing, solutioning and architecting Supply Chain processes would be an advantage.
Strong techno-functional experience with a strong understanding or experience with new SAP applications and technologies, such as Fiori, AI-enabled applications, BTP, and Signavio, is preferred.
Preferred Certifications:
SAP Certifications: SAP Financials
BE AWARE OF FRAUD: When applying for a job at Jabil you will be contacted via correspondence through our official job portal with a jabil.com e-mail address; direct phone call from a member of the Jabil team; or direct e-mail with a jabil.com e-mail address. Jabil does not request payments for interviews or at any other point during the hiring process. Jabil will not ask for your personal identifying information such as a social security number, birth certificate, financial institution, driver’s license number or passport information over the phone or via e-mail. If you believe you are a victim of identity theft, contact your local police department. Any scam job listings should be reported to whatever website it was posted in.
Jabil, including its subsidiaries, is an equal opportunity employer and considers qualified applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, disability, genetic information, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
Accessibility Accommodation
If you are a qualified individual with a disability, you have the right to request a reasonable accommodation if you are unable or limited in your ability to use or access Jabil.com/Careers site as a result of your disability. You can request a reasonable accommodation by sending an e-mail to
Always_Accessible@Jabil.com
with the nature of your request and contact information. Please do not direct any other general employment related questions to this e-mail. Please note that only those inquiries concerning a request for reasonable accommodation will be responded to.#whereyoubelong

Title: Solution Specialist (Analytics)
Full Job Description:
Esri Malaysia is a multi‐national organization specializing in enterprise software solution for large public sector customers, GLC and corporates in Malaysia. We expanded our business to Malaysia in 1983 and have since developed a loyal customer base leveraging on strong brand recognition, globally proven solution and industry expertise in Malaysia, South Asia and USA. We have largest market share and business growth is promising. Existing pool of resources can provide high quality consultancy services, project implementation and comprehensive customer support and now employs over 200 people in Malaysia.
As we continue to evolve and grow our business, we are looking for new ways to work more efficiently and more effectively. That’s where you come in!
About the Role
What you'll do:
Analyze and interpret large-scale geospatial datasets from satellite, aerial, or drone imagery, and GIS databases.
Apply statistical, geostatistical, and machine learning techniques to identify spatial patterns and trends.
Build spatial prediction and classification models (e.g., land cover mapping, suitability analysis, risk modeling).
Develop and automate geospatial workflows using Python, R, or other scripting languages
Design and implement machine learning models tailored for spatial data (e.g., object detection in imagery, change detection, clustering).
Implement deep learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch) for geospatial tasks like semantic segmentation.
Collaborate with developers and engineers to integrate models and tools into enterprise systems or web applications.
About You
We believe that to be successful in this role you will need:
Degree in Geographical Information System/Artificial Intelligence/Data Science or a related discipline.
Working experience of at least 5 years, with a minimum of 3 years working experience using or modeling using Machine Learning & Deep Learning.
Strong knowledge in following areas:
o Raster image analysis
o Image change detection
o Image classification, enhancement, segmentation
o Python scripting
o Parallel computing for Machine Learning
Familiar with Deep Learning and Artificial Intelligence (A.I.) workflows.
Knowledge in Jupyter-notebook is an added advantage.
Knowledge in RBDMS such as SQL Server, Oracle or PostgreSql is an added advantage.
Able to work well under pressure while maintaining quality.
Possess good communication skills.
Possess a good learning attitude and keen to take on technical challenges.
Why Esri Malaysia
At Esri Malaysia, we foster an inclusive, people-centric environment that values both professional excellence and personal well-being. Joining us, you will be provided with:
Empowered Flexibility:
We offer flexible work arrangements to promote work-life balance. New employees are required to attend their local office full-time for the first three months to ensure a comprehensive onboarding experience before agreeing to a hybrid model.
Investment in your Growth
: Access dedicated training and development programs, allowing you to continuously upskill and grow in your role.
Career Advancement:
We promote internal mobility, and provide clear pathways for career progression, empowering you to navigate and elevate your professional journey.
Appreciation and Engagement:
Enjoy a range of benefits, including Flexi Benefits, Mobile Phone Allowance, Medical & Insurance, Yearly Salary Increment, Referral Spotter Fees, Staff Awards, Engaging Events, and much more.
Performance Recognition:
Enjoy a financially rewarding profit-sharing bonus.
For further details or if you have any questions, please contact our Talent Acquisition team by mail at
fjaffar@esrimalaysia.com.my
(Fadhillah).
We are a 2025 Circle Back Initiative Employer – we commit to respond to every applicant.

Title: Cloud Service Engineer - MRO
Full Job Description:
【Description】：
HUAWEI CLOUD is a leading cloud service provider, which brings Huawei's 30-plus years of expertise together in ICT infrastructure products and solutions. We are committed to providing reliable, secure, and cost-effective cloud services to empower applications, harness the power of data, and help organizations of all sizes grow in today's intelligent world. HUAWEI CLOUD is also committed to bringing affordable, effective, and reliable cloud and AI services through technological innovation.
Job responsibilities:
1.      Understand the business scenarios of large and medium-sized enterprises, cooperate with the IT, application architecture of the enterprise, sort out and analyze the existing IT architecture of the customers, and promote the landing, implementation and delivery of the design solutions provided by the pre-sales architects;
2.      Based on the customer's business requirements and Huawei Cloud Stack technical architecture, develop and implement solutions that meet customer requirements;
3.      Based on best practice, design and Implement cloud migration such as host and data migration of customers' existing application systems to Huawei Cloud Stack, manage and provide technical support for the entire migration process.
4.      Regularly communicate with key customers (on-site or remotely) to ensure the healthy and stable running of cloud services and improve customer experience.
5.      Have a sense of responsibility, be able to practice customer first in daily service, and achieve customer success.
Job requirements:
1.      Bachelor's degree in communication engineering, computer science and technology, network engineering, electronic information engineering or equivalent.
2.      Minimum 2-3 years of working experience in ICT Technology, IT infrastructure domain, Knowledgeable in IT & Telecom, Network, Cloud Computing, Project Management, and Service Management. Experience in aftersales and working with large enterprise customers.
3.      Be familiar with virtualization architectures such as OpenStack and mainstream public cloud services. Be able to clearly describe their working principles and basic architecture logic. Have a certain understanding of the differences between cloud services of different brands;
4.      Be familiar with common operating systems (Linux/Windows), network-related knowledge (DNS/BGP/VPN/ELB/IP)
5.      Experience in architecting/operating/migrate solutions build on virtualize (compute, network and storage) and cloud as VMware, Hyper-V, Huawei, AWS, Azure, GCP in complex enterprise environments
6.      Experience in operation and maintenance of IT infrastructure (including server, storage, database, network, middleware, mainstream file system); Experience in enterprise-level application architecture design or cloud service integration implementation is preferred;
7.      Experience with software development methodologies and programming languages such as Java or Python
8.      Experience with enterprise services (Security, Directory Services, Virtual Desktop, etc.), databases (MySQL/PG/SQL Server/Oracle) is preferred.
9.      Ability to analyze quantitatively, problem-solve, and scope business requirements.
10.   Strong communication and collaboration skills
11.   Ability to meet tight deadlines and prioritize workloads.
12.   HCIA, HCIP or HCIE certification will be additional advantages.
13.   Contract(s) position available.

Accenture is a leading global professional services company that helps the world’s leading businesses, governments and other organizations build their digital core, optimize their operations, accelerate revenue growth and enhance citizen services—creating tangible value at speed and scale. From multi-year major systems integration transformation deals to shorter more agile engagements, we have a rapidly expanding portfolio of hyper-growth clients and an increasing footprint with next-gen technology and industry practices, with the following requirements:

to deliver management consulting projects for global clients.

programs and process enablement for our clients.
Develop assets &
point-of-view (POV) or white papers
for use by the team and larger community.

as an expert for a specific domain area in coordination with other team members.
Experience
to engage with stakeholders independently.

and context for change. Engage stakeholders in the change journey and build commitment for change.

gathering sessions with stakeholders to elicit, prioritize, and validate requirements, ensuring a clear understanding of business needs and objectives.

to translate business requirements into technical specifications and create user stories for implementation by development teams.
Bring your best skills forward to excel in the role:
Skills in one or more Telecom areas
BSS Modules and Telco Journeys:

Lean Concepts and Agile Practices

Agile Tools

Skills in one or more roles:

Business Analysis -

Value Architect and Tracking

Experience in large data analysis, data driven consulting, BI and analytics, reporting, dashboarding, visualization tools like PowerBI, Tableau
Certifications like CBAP, CSM, SPC, TMForum- eTOM, ITIL ,Prince 2 or PMP will be an added advantage
Strong analytical, problem-solving skills and good communication skills

Experience of team Management – Coach and mentor team members in projects, on asset development, BDs and overall professional development

Title: PMO Specialist
Full Job Description:
Company description:
CelcomDigi Berhad (Registration No. 199701009694 (425190-X)) is Malaysia's widest and fastest network with more than 20 million users on our network. Officially established on 30th November 2022, we aim to serve the growing digital needs of our customers by leveraging our newly combined widest network footprint, distribution touchpoints, innovative range of digital products and services, and superior customer experience powered by over 4,000 top industry experts. We have clearly defined ambitions to advance the nation, inspire Malaysian society, and be a leader in inclusion and responsible business practices.
Job description:
Establish and maintain project management frameworks, support project teams, ensure governance and quality assurance, manage project tracking and reporting, oversee procurement and financials, support audits, and facilitate collaboration, communication, and onboarding/offboarding across technology projects and programs.
Responsibilities
Establish and maintain a standard set of frameworks, practices, processes and templates for managing projects and programs consistently and efficiently.
Assist with advising Project Managers and teams on the best use of Project Management disciplines and approaches and act as the first point of contact for any Project Management framework queries.
Maintain and improve a robust governance process that captures, reports and escalates project status across all measurable project characteristics, informing Technology leadership in a timely manner.
Manage consolidated view of all Technology projects including milestones/deliverables.
Perform quality assurance on projects/programs in line with the defined Project Management Framework
Track and govern resource utilization for project/program.
Manage, execute and track procurement processes on behalf of projects.
Assist Project/Program Manager in tracking the project financial forecast and actual and highlight any discrepancy and anticipated risk
Assist Project/Program in developing and maintaining the progress report and various presentation material for management forum.
Work with the Project/Program team to ensure all project deliverables are timely produced and stored in the designated repository.  Support audit with internal and external auditor for Project delivery and control related.
Support the Project/Program in the areas of project collaboration, communication, training, project tooling, resource management, change control and others as assigned.
Conduct Project/Program staff onboarding and offboarding activities including physical and system access
Requirements
Bachelor's degree in any discipline with professional Project Management certification preferred.
Minimum 3-5+ years of PMO work experience, 5+ years of experience in IT project management preferred
Experience in Agile Delivery will be an added advantage
Should have experience tracking deliverables and providing accurate and transparent reporting to management including drafting of materials for governance and leadership meetings
Strong knowledge of project management methodology including management of high-level and detailed project plans, preferably experience in Microsoft project.  Experience in Agile is highly preferred
Motivated to maintain project standards and hold project management teams accountable for compliance and reporting requirements
Strong issues resolution experience with excellent analytical, conceptual, troubleshooting and problem-solving skills
A highly positive, motivate and proactive self-starter who is able to work in a team as well as independently.  Solid time and take management skills; must be able to take full ownership and responsibility for own workload as well as manage competing and conflicting requirements
Passionate about analysing PMO-related issues as well as building and improving existing processes

Title: Cloud Infrastructure Engineer - AWS Cloud
Full Job Description:
ABOUT US
Headquartered in Sydney, Australia, and operating globally, Soprano Design is a leading global communications platform as a service (CPaaS) provider that brings nearly 30 years of experience with enterprise-level mobile messaging to each of our over 4,500 government and enterprise clients around the globe.
Soprano’s flagship product, Soprano Connect, is an innovative award-winning CPaaS platform that helps customers to strategically integrate, email, SMS, voice, conversational AI, IP messaging and social channels such as RCS, WhatsApp and Google Business Messages into a seamless secure omni-channel business mobile messaging experience.
POSITION SUMMARY
As a Cloud Infrastructure Engineer, you will serve as a technical expert of Soprano’s Global Infrastructure Team in the areas of AWS, cloud-native networking, IaC tools, scripting languages and system administration for RedHat Enterprise Linux.
Your main responsibilities including performing monitoring along with operational and support work (patch, tuning, etc.) to ensure security, performance and availability of the corporate service delivery platform around the world to meet KPIs. This position will require you to participate in on call rotation to provide incident response where you will need to identify methods, solutions, and provide project leadership and management to provide a high level of service to internal users.
Position:
Individual Contributor
Department:
Infrastructure
Company:
SilverStreet Malaysia
Location:
Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia (Bukit Bintang)
Reports to:
Infrastructure Manager
Type:
Permanent, Full-time
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
This includes but is not limited to:
Design, develop and implement automation and orchestration to deliver Cloud-based platforms through infrastructure-as-code. Provide technical leadership in solution design and architecture discussions, in collaboration with developers and other Platform engineers.
Drive innovation and continuous improvement in the way we design, build and operate our platforms, including but not limited to areas such as AWS, cloud-native networking, IaC tools, scripting languages and system administration for RedHat Enterprise Linux.
Perform ongoing monitoring, administration, maintenance and tuning of systems in all environments (Production, Development, Testing/QA), to ensure the highest level of security and performance for Soprano’s mission critical service delivery platforms, to meet capacity requirements and availability KPIs.
Resolve complex technical issues by performing troubleshooting, analyzing issues and formulating solutions as required, based on industry best practices. Participate in on call rotation for incident response.  Where called upon, provide subject matter expertise for response, diagnosis and resolution during incident response.
Execute and ensure compliance with policies and procedures to maintain security and protect systems from unauthorized use, acts of nature and user abuse.  Ensure timely application of revisions to systems and network components.
Where called upon, contribute to the development of policies, procedures and standards to be used by the organization when operating on the cloud.
Perform other tasks or activities as may be directed or assigned to you by the Infrastructure Manager from time to time.
SKILLS & EXPERIENCE TO SUCCEED
Education: Bachelor’s degree in information systems or computer science, extensive Information Systems or Computer Science experience may also be considered in lieu of a degree.
Minimum 3 years of experience in Red Hat Linux operating systems and virtualization technologies.  RHEL certification would be a strong advantage.
Hands-on experience with AWS Cloud.
Experienced in automation and programming languages such as JavaScript, Python, Bash/Shell, or others.
Experienced in Infrastructure-as-Code.  1 - 3 years of experience in the use Terraform/ Jenkins / Ansible / Puppet / Bitbucket is required.
AWS certification preferred, Azure or GCP may also be also considered.  At minimum, should possess practical knowledge of AWS foundation services related to compute, network, storage, administration and security, deployment and management, automation technologies.
Familiarity with using AWS Cloud Services (EC2, RDS, API Gateway, Lambda, CloudFormation, CloudWatch, ELB, etc)
Proficient with relational databases (RDS, DB2, or PostgresSQL).  Certification in administration of any database technologies would be a strong advantage.
Strong understanding of the importance of and the maintenance of security and compliance standards, with experience in vulnerability management and patch management. CISSP or equivalent security-related industry certification would be a strong advantage.
Experienced with monitoring, telemetry and logging tools such as Nagios, Zabbix, Newrelic, Datadog, or other industry recognized monitoring / log management tools
Strong understanding of incident, problem and change management process within the ITSM context.  ITIL certification would be a strong advantage.
Exceptional and proven problem solving and troubleshooting skills with a focus on root cause analysis and remediation
Team player with excellent communication and collaboration skills within an international context
Enjoy working in a fast-paced, developing, and evolving environment
WHY WORK FOR SOPRANO:
Work for a leader in the CPaaS industry:
We are a leading enabler for enterprise communications, with a customer-centered approach that allows us to reach significant results with our clients and partners.
Our focus on Technology:
We pride ourselves on building technology for the future of communication that creates richer meanings, deeper trust and better connections.
Global presence:
Soprano is headquartered in Sydney, but we have a global presence in Europe, North America, South America, New Zealand and Southeast Asia
Collaborative and inclusive environment:
We are committed to a workplace environment where every employee is respected and empowered to be their best selves at work.
Training and Development
: We're a small company with big ideas that gives you the opportunity to gain valuable insight and exposure to various departments and markets worldwide.
Competitive salaries:
We are a pay for performance company that values your contributions through our competitive salaries, rewards and recognition programs
Flexible Working:
This arrangement allows us to stay connected to our global teams while allocating time to do the things we love. Currently, we work three days in the office. Some roles are remote due to scope.
People are at the core of what we do and Soprano Design Pty Ltd is committed to a safe, diverse and inclusive workplace where we all thrive and succeed together. We encourage applications regardless of age, gender, nationalities, backgrounds and cultures. Please let us know if you require any adjustments to the recruitment process.
All successful applicants will need to provide two professional reference checks and is subject to satisfactory background checks

Title: Chief Technology Officer
Full Job Description:
About the Role
We are seeking a visionary Chief Technology Officer (CTO) to drive the technology strategy, digital innovation, and engineering excellence for AirAsia MOVE. This role will be instrumental in scaling our platforms, enhancing security, and leading a world-class tech team to deliver industry-leading travel experiences.
As CTO, you will oversee all technical aspects of the company, ensuring that products, platforms, and services are developed efficiently, securely, and in alignment with our business objectives. You will collaborate with cross-functional leaders to bridge technology and business, accelerating our digital transformation journey.
This is an exciting opportunity to lead and inspire top-tier engineering talent, shape the technological future of AirAsia MOVE, and drive impact at scale. We offer competitive remuneration, wide-ranging benefits, and an inclusive, fast-moving work environment that fosters career development and innovation.
Key Responsibilities
1. Technology Strategy & Digital Transformation
Define and execute a comprehensive technology roadmap aligned with business objectives.
Oversee the scalability, security, and efficiency of AirAsia MOVE’s core platforms, including booking, payments, and customer experience systems.
Drive cloud-native architectures, API-first development, and AI-driven innovation.
Collaborate with executive leadership and business units to align technology investments with strategic goals.
2. Engineering Leadership & Innovation
Lead high-performing software development, infrastructure, and security teams.
Foster a culture of innovation, agility, and engineering excellence.
Implement best-in-class DevOps, CI/CD, and cloud infrastructure to enhance efficiency.
Accelerate the adoption of AI, automation, and predictive analytics to improve the user experience.
3. Risk & Compliance
Strengthen fraud detection and transaction security across MOVE’s payment systems.
Establish robust disaster recovery and business continuity plans.
4. Cloud, Infrastructure & Data Management
Lead a multi-cloud strategy (GCP, Azure, Alibaba) for cost efficiency and performance optimization.
Implement real-time monitoring and AI-powered anomaly detection for system health.
Ensure seamless integrations of OTA, Fintech, Loyalty, and Community services.
Enhance data analytics, governance, and AI-driven decision-making.
5. Operational Excellence & Business Alignment
Optimize IT budgets, technology spend, and resource allocation.
Oversee SRE (Site Reliability Engineering) teams to drive uptime, reliability, and efficiency.
Partner with Product, Marketing, and Customer Experience teams to enhance the traveler journey.
Required Qualifications & Experience
15+ years of experience in technology leadership, with at least 5 years as a CTO, CIO, or VP of Engineering.
Proven track record scaling high-traffic platforms in OTA, e-commerce, fintech, or travel tech.
Strong expertise in cloud-native development, cybersecurity, and microservices architectures.
Experience in AI, automation, and data-driven personalization.
Deep knowledge of regulatory frameworks, compliance, and IT governance.
Ability to align technology initiatives with business objectives and drive cross-functional collaboration.
Strong leadership, communication, stakeholder management skills and learning agility.
Passion for building and mentoring high-performing tech teams.
Preferred
Prior experience in large-scale travel, airline, fintech, or e-commerce platforms.
Expertise in AI/ML, blockchain, or emerging Web3 technologies.
Certifications such as CISSP, CISM, AWS/GCP Solutions Architect, or ITIL.
Why Join AirAsia MOVE?
Lead the transformation of AirAsia MOVE into a cutting-edge, all in one travel app.
Shape the future of OTA and fintech-driven travel experiences.
Work in a fast-paced, innovative environment.
Competitive compensation, stock options, and executive perks.
If you are a visionary tech leader ready to make a massive impact, we’d love to hear from you!
Apply now and be part of the journey!

Title: Cloud FinOps Specialist
Full Job Description:
Company description:
CelcomDigi Berhad (Registration No. 199701009694 (425190-X)) is Malaysia's widest and fastest network with more than 20 million users on our network. Officially established on 30th November 2022, we aim to serve the growing digital needs of our customers by leveraging our newly combined widest network footprint, distribution touchpoints, innovative range of digital products and services, and superior customer experience powered by over 4,000 top industry experts. We have clearly defined ambitions to advance the nation, inspire Malaysian society, and be a leader in inclusion and responsible business practices.
Job description:
Experienced in managing complex multi-cloud environments for both financial and technical related matters. Experienced in bridging business requirements into technical workability without compromising security and operational standards. Passionate about staying abreast of industry developments, emerging cloud technologies and best practices related to cloud computing.
Responsibilities
Analyze complex, multi-cloud cost and performance datasets to facilitate usage and rate optimization. Identify optimization opportunities and reduce waste, tracking opportunities to resolution.
Continuous follow up with platform PIC to ensure all workloads are provisioned accurately.
Participate in complex architectural discussions to help platform/project teams make cost-efficient technology choices. Serve as a subject matter expert on cloud financial management best practices, cost management mechanisms, and cost-effective cloud architecture.
Develop and maintain relationships with key stakeholders and their teams to support them with FinOps tools, framework, processes, and data.
Deploy and maintain commercial and open source FinOps tools, training end users as needed.
Investigate cost anomalies and discrepancies to identify root causes and communicate corrective actions.
Stay updated on cloud pricing models, cost management tools, and standard methodologies in FinOps.
Create accurate forecasting of cloud spend. Evaluate monthly spending to be in-line with yearly forecasted numbers, liaise with stakeholders to ensure all Cloud-related transactions (i.e. payments, budgets, contracts) are managed accurately.
Provide cost analysis/usage reports to key personnel on a set cadence and drive a culture of cost accountability.
Requirements
Bachelor's degree in information technology, Management Information Systems, Computer Science or related discipline
2-4 Years of hands-on experience deploying and managing resources in AWS and/or Azure.
1-3 Years of FinOps or Cloud Operations experience
Technical understanding of core AWS and Azure service offerings
FinOps Certified Practitioner, AWS Cloud Practitioner and/or Azure Fundamentals certification
Experience configuring and maintaining Corent, Cloudability, CloudZero, FinOut, AWS Cloud Intelligence Dashboards, Azure FinOps Hub, or similar cloud financial management platforms.
Strong quantitative data analysis skills: ability to use hard data and metrics to support assumptions, recommendations, and drive actions.
Proficient in Microsoft Excel, PowerBI, and PowerPoint or similar programs
Superior planning, organization, and problem-solving ability
Excellent relationship building and people skills.

Title: Technical Team Leader
Full Job Description:
About the role
Emiwave Sdn. Bhd. is seeking a talented Technical Team Leader to join our rapidly growing team in Kuala Lumpur. As a Technical Team Leader, you will be responsible for overseeing and directing a team of skilled IT professionals, ensuring the successful delivery of complex projects and driving continuous improvement within our technical operations.
What you'll be doing
Overall responsible to achieve performance target of the service delivery & support team
Manage a team of IT support engineers with various skillsets (Network, systems, cloud, security, desktops/laptops, OS, email) in remote and onsite maintenance service support, troubleshooting, resolution, ticket creation and closing, escalation.
Provide technical guidance and advice to the team of service delivery and support engineers
Build highest level of L1, L2 Service Delivery, support competencies, competitive edge via ITIL, ITSM Practice
Develop, build technical excellence and competencies with certifications in Servers, Storage, Cloud & Cybersecurity
Develop high performance remote and onsite maintenance support capabilities and procedures to achieve best-in-class service level guarantees
Build & develop IT Managed Service Provider & Managed Security Service Provider
Build & develop AI, Intelligence Auto Alerts on existing or new IT support systems (All-In-PSA & RMM with Inventory discovery, IT automation, Remote Access, Patch Management, SLA, Billing & Invoice, integration to CRM and Financial Accounting)
Manage trouble tickets, process and documentation for deployment, commissioning, maintenance, support
Support RMA process for end-user customers, and manage RMA process with vendors
Liaise with vendors/principals on all technical related matter. Escalation procedure to level 3 support by Vendors/Principals
Build, train and transfer system/server/storage knowledge to other team members, users and stakeholders as required
Coordinate and manage all IT change requests
Understand all aspects of system configuration and technical/functional capabilities
Perform user acceptance testing, troubleshooting and tests on the required systems
Pre-sale technical support to end-users on system/server/storage/virtualization/cloud detail technical design and specifications
Support all business reporting requirements
Manage user profile, assigning roles, security settings, etc.
Monitor and identify business and security risks, inefficiencies, issues and opportunities related to systems and work processes
Manage and handling projects with relevant skillset and expertise. Including but not limited to project management, coordination, planning and scheduling with stakeholders and provide actual configuration and implementation base on the requirement and to satisfy customer needs stated out on the project scope and deliverable
Perform any other IT support requirements
Regional assignment relating to the above if required
New technical tasks may be assigned from time to time
What we're looking for
Diploma or Degree in Electrical / Electronic / Computer Engineering / Computer Science / Information Systems from a recognized institution
In-depth, hands-on technical knowledge on Servers, Storage, Cloud, Backup, Networks
Related certifications with Microsoft, or HPE, or Huawei, Or Lenovo
5 or more years of experience in Servers/storage/Cloud/Network
3 or more years of leading, managing a team of support, service engineers in a IT MSP/SI
3 or more years of ITIL implementation, practices and processes
3 or more years of delivering, overachieving support services targets/SLAs
Good hands-on knowledge and troubleshooting skills on IT systems, especially Cloud/Servers/Storage, OS, Cybersecurity, or Networks
Good customer interaction, written and oral communication skills
Ability to work with all levels, and ability to work and contribute in a team or individually
What we offer
At Emiwave Sdn. Bhd., we are committed to providing a rewarding and fulfilling work environment for our employees. We offer competitive remuneration, opportunities for career advancement, and a range of benefits to support your personal and professional development.
If you're ready to take the next step in your career and join a dynamic, forward-thinking organisation, we encourage you to apply for this exciting Technical Team Leader role. Click
apply now
to submit your application.

Title: Data Scientist, Asia
Full Job Description:
Primary Details
Time Type: Full timeWorker Type: EmployeeThe purpose of this role is to apply scientific principles and data-driven analytics to improve the quality and performance of business units. This involves translating stakeholders' needs into analytically tractable problems, applying scientific methods and big data tools to resolve them, and communicating findings back to business owners. The role also includes taking ownership of technical project delivery and serving as a modelling and data science partner for assigned business areas to ensure scientific integrity in work products.
The opportunity:
Develop and refine analytical use cases with internal business customers in alignment with Analytics leads and partners.
Play an active role in projects of diverse scope, range, priority and urgency within the insurance domain.
Translate between business and analytical problems.
Interrogate and interpret data and models to formulate, evaluate and iterate hypotheses quickly.
Integrate, format and present relevant analyses and data visualizations to communicate results, findings and recommendations to business users.
Act as a Machine Learning expert in order to support Data & Analytics colleagues and business stakeholders
Direct the work of onshore and offshore analytics and data science projects.
Plan own activities for each sprint, accurately estimating effort for stories/tasks.
Ensure compliance with QBE policies and procedures and relevant legislation.
Share knowledge and contribute reusable practices and techniques within and beyond the team.
About You:
Experience in producing insights from large datasets.
Analytics experience with R, Python, Spark.
Collaborative programming project experience.
Comfortable in a Linux environment.
Qualifications:
Necessary Qualifications include:
Tertiary Degree or equivalent combination of education and work experience.
Preferred Qualifications include:
Bachelor to Postgraduate Degree in a Quantitative field such as Computer Science, Engineering, Statistics, Mathematics or related disciplines.

At QBE, we’re enabling a more resilient future – for our customers, communities, environment, and for our people. We’re building momentum to achieve something significant and know our people are at the centre of our success.

And with more than 13,000 people working across 27 countries, our scale means we’re big enough for your ambitions, yet small enough for you to make a real impact.
QBE Asia’s operations is part of the QBE International Division, and has had a presence in Asia for more than 130 years with offices in: Singapore, Hong Kong & Macau, Malaysia and Vietnam. We continue to be recognised for our ongoing focus on digital innovation to deliver exceptional value and operational excellence for our customers, business partners, people and the community. We support ESG efforts through the QBE Foundation, which helps to create strong, resilient and inclusive communities, by focusing investment and efforts on two key areas where we believe we can have the greatest impact – climate resilience and inclusion.

Title: Senior Data Scientist (Analytics) - Mobility
Full Job Description:
Get to Know the Team:
The Analytics team's mission is to use data and experimentation to advance product innovation. We love building hacky products to test and iterate what's best for our customers. As we ship multiple products every week, it means we have to fine-tune models, run and evaluate hundreds of experiments weekly! We are looking for experienced data scientists to build a center of data excellence for Product & Experimentation in a diverse range of tech families. Your role is to guide a data-first approach to product thinking, design controlled experiments, and be objective while evaluating results, all of this while working with stakeholders to evaluate innovative product and business ideas! You will help developers, designers & product managers across the company with recommendations on how to learn from unexpected results, study underlying causes for them, and iterate on the next set of products to build for our users.
Get to Know the Role:
Reporting to the Product Analytics Manager, you will work closely with different teams within a business line (Product, Business, Engineering, Design, and Data Science) to understand data requirements, identify and track key metrics, and provide data-driven insights. You will also work with stakeholders to evaluate the feasibility of new business/product ideas and provide appropriate recommendations.
This role is based in Petaling Jaya and onsite.
The Critical Tasks You Will Perform
You will analyze existing data and recommend new product ideas to address impactful customer problems based on business objectives.
You will identify trends, spot anomalies, and investigate their root causes using data.
You will utilize your data analysis and visualization skills to present insights and tell a compelling story to a non-technical audience.
You will collaborate with stakeholders to align on key product metrics and propose experimentation strategies, including A/B testing.
You will design and manage data specifications for new products, ensuring accurate data collection in collaboration with engineering teams.
You will mentor junior team members, promote high standards in data handling, and develop scalable frameworks to address recurring problems efficiently.

Title: Solution Specialist (Pre-sales)
Full Job Description:
Main accountabilities (100% of total time spent)
Wired, IP Core, IP RAN, NFVI ( Telco Cloud and NFVI):
Required to plan on SOW (Scope of Work) for any of the customer’s project and collaborate with NEC Service & Design Senior Engineers.
Design and implement network solutions using principal Service Provider technologies (Cisco, Juniper) to ensure robust and scalable infrastructure.
Oversee the deployment and management of principal’s Switching & Routing, Wireless Networking, and VPN solutions to maintain seamless connectivity.
Provide technical expertise Service Provider routing protocols ie : BGP-LS/LU , Segment Routing, ISIS, OSPFv3 and etc.
Have experience with Service provider environment in architecting / designing for network setup and services inclusive migration/ troubleshooting / Integration to 3rd party devices
Collaborate with Network team to align on network infrastructure with business requirements and objectives.
Conduct regular network assessments and audits to identify potential vulnerabilities and areas for improvement.
Develop and maintain comprehensive network documentation, including diagrams, configurations, Method & Standard operating procedures.
Lead troubleshooting efforts to resolve complex network issues and minimize downtime. - Implement best practices for network & security, including user access and identity management, to protect sensitive data and systems.
Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies to ensure the network infrastructure remains cutting-edge.
Provide training and support to Network staff on network-related topics to enhance their technical skills and knowledge.
Participate in the planning and execution of network upgrades and migrations to ensure minimal disruption to business operations.
Collaborate with vendors and service providers to ensure the timely delivery of network services and support.
Monitor network performance and implement optimization strategies to improve efficiency and user experience.
Demonstrate expertise in SPSL focus principal Switching & Routing, Wireless Networking, and VPN solutions. (Namely Cisco, Juniper)
Possess a strong understanding of SPSL focus principal Service Provider products ie: ASR 900 series, ASR9k series, NCS series, NSO, EPNM and etc.
Work closely with respective Sales (Client Account Managers), Business Unit Sales (Sales Specialist) and presales teams to closely plan out and Solution Architect on role-play, round table discussions, best practice sharing, meeting to continuously support and maintain working process flow in order and according to project directions, KPIs and deliverables.
Required to be equipped and maintain with the latest telco solution and best practices knowledge. Certification and examination required and will get approval sand sponsored from the line manager.
On-call, stand-by support if necessary and/or as project demands.
Networks (Security, Data Center, Service Provider and Enterprise Routing and Switching):
·       Network Engineer or IP Core Engineer or ISP Certified Engineer or CCNP ISP (Cisco Certified Network Professional ISP), CCIE (Cisco Certified Internet Expert ISP), JCNIE SP (Juniper Networks Certified Internet Expert Service Provider), and/or  JCNP SPRS (Juniper Certifications Network Professional Service Provider Routing and Switching) will have advantage
·       Network Engineer with Cisco/Juniper and equivalent certifications (Data Center/ Enterprise and Service Provider Routing and Switching).
·       Solution architect the HLD (High Level Design) by designing the telco solution design, and network schematic. Identifying, monitoring, and defining the requirements of the overall customer requirement.
Other business assignment:
As assigned by Direct Report Manager.
Degree of independent decision-making:
Act on decision that impact the NS Division and affiliate
·       50% of independent decision can be made by this position
·       50% of decision needs to be jointly rectified by Business Unit Manager and Direct Reporting Manager.
Degree of influence on departmental / function / NECoMAL results:
Medium degree of influence to GNS Division.
·       Provide excellent presales and solution architect base on ISP network solutions. Significant contributions to the organisation’s sales targets.
This is due to increase in customer’s confident level and potential clients’ buy-in
for converting to using NECoMAL products.
Communication / Interaction with others internally or externally:
·       Communication and interaction with both internal & external stakeholder of NECoMAL and other Cas as CoE member
·       Discussions with internal team (e.g. Sales, Business Unit Sales Specialist, Technical Support Team and Project Team) on issues, provide quality inputs, propose constructive feedback and solicit collective agreement to address gaps or process improvement.
·       External parties: NEC’s clients, partners & outsourced partners.
Percentage of job scope i.e. working away from the home country:
·       100% Malaysia (in a case-to-case basis, if necessary and/or required, out of the country dispatch is possible)
·       Home country = Malaysia
Education
·       Diploma or Degree in Telecommunication / Computer Science or equivalent.
·       Required minimum 5 years’ experience in ISP or telco services line to apply.
Work experience
·       5-10 years’ experience in Service Provider segment
·       5-10 years’ experience in ISP / Telco Operations & Maintenance and Preventive Maintenance, Installation and Commissioning of wired, wireless and software defined systems knowledge, but not limited to actual server and networks devices integration solution knowledge.
·       Proficient working knowledge in both IP Transport Networks but not limited to Microwave and Optical Transmission System equipment, associated theories and technologies, and in-depth know-how in Installation is an advantage.
·       Multi-vendor experience with IP Core, IP RAN, Microwave and IP Packet Radios, GPON, PTN, DWDM, Submarine Optical System, OSS, BSS, Application Software deployment is an advantage.
·       Proficient in speaking and writing English and Bahasa Malaysia, including advance skill sets in using MS Office.
·       High Integrity, Customer Centric, Confident, Team Player, Analytical, Flexible, Adaptive, Proactive, Interactive, Accountable, Resourceful & Trusted Change Agent.
Competency profiles
General Skills
·     Customer Focus (Proficient level)
·     Problem Solving Skills (Proficient level)
·     Process Improvement (Proficient level)
·     Emotional Intelligence (Basic level)
·     Analytical and Structured Thinking (Proficient level)
·     Communication (Proficient level)
·     Quality of Work (Proficient level)
·     Cost Consciousness (Basic level)
·     Teamwork/Collaboration (Master level)
·     Passion for Innovation (Master level)
·     Drive Changes (Proficient level)
Technical Skills
·       Networks (Routing, Switching, Service Provider, Cloud Infrastructure, Orchestration, Automation, DevOps).
·       Juniper Certified (at least JNCP level)
·       Cisco Certified (at least CCNP)
·       OpenStack Certifications is a plus
·       Strong knowledge and extensive experience working on a multi -layer telco environment from L2 switches, L3 routers, servers, upper NMS, other third-party legacy and IP/Packet backhaul equipment for Trunk, Aggregation and Access Networks,
2G, 2.5G, 3G, 4G/LTE and 5G Network technologies, TDM Voice and Signalling.
·       Fundamental understanding of the specifications of different optical fiber types, optical losses and link budgets, associated dispersion compensation, DWDM, SONET/SDH, ROADM and the likes, Ethernet technologies, timing and synchronization and protection configurations such as LMSP, N:1, N+1, ring topologies and related wireless phenomena such as fading, ducting, reflections, refraction, diffraction, k-factor and earth bulge, Fresnel zone and anomalous propagations.
·       Ability to design L2 and L3 equipment and devices such as Cisco and/or Juniper Switches and Routers and integrate it to Network Elements (southbound) and Network Management Systems (northbound).
·       Ability to provision, and perform troubleshooting of servers based on UNIX, LINUX and WINDOWS Network Management Systems environment.
·       Able to read, interpret and convert to lay man’s term structural telco site drawings and network diagrams, but not limited to traffic and management signalling flows for fault isolations and troubleshooting.
·       Ability to use and interpret results from telco test equipment such as PDH/SDH Analyzer, Power Meter, BER Tester and Ethernet Tester in validating industry standard and specifications test such as RFC2544, RFC6349 and the likes.
·       Solution Development life cycle skills.
·       Network Design, Implementation and O&M skills.
·       Ability to clearly communicate and present ideas and information to Manager level.
·       Ability to clearly communicate network issues, design issues, implementation issues, findings and recommendations to fix and resolve the problem with both short term and long-term plans.

Title: Customer Success Consultant
Full Job Description:
About the job
About our Team
LexisNexis Legal & Professional, which serves customers in more than 150 countries with 11,800 employees worldwide, is part of RELX, a global provider of information-based analytics and decision tools for professional and business customers. Our company has been a long-time leader in deploying AI and advanced technologies to the legal market to improve productivity and transform the overall business and practice of law, deploying ethical and powerful generative AI solutions with a flexible, multi-model approach that prioritizes using the best model from today’s top model creators for each individual legal use case.
About the Role
The purpose of this role is part of Customer Success team that drives customer success through better servicing and retaining customers. This role has 3 major responsibilities: i) to map out customer journey, understand customers’ pain points and address them with effective solutions; ii) to track customers’ usage and build relevant programs to induce higher usage; iii) to drive thought leadership programs, training and focus groups to better engage customers. The success of this role will be measured by NPS, AED, net POS growth, customer retention and customer account growth
This role will be accountable for the metrics-driven customer success program, leading a cross-functional team (Sales, Product, CS, GOTC) who will each be responsible for their respective action in delivering customer-focused servicing. This team will map out a few customers’ journey for a) prestige customer group, b) new customers on-boarding, c) win-back program, etc.
Responsibilities:
Design and develop end-to end customer journey and success program
Define customers segments based on set criteria indicating customer importance, growth potential
Map out customers' journey and relevant touchpoints impacting customers' needs and satisfaction, for both Print & Online products
Work with Products, Sales, Marketing, CS to design strategy, value-add service, product offering, pricing to drive customer stickness and satisfaction
Lead CDI, product UAT and feedback sessions and channel insights and data to product and technical teams on benefits and areas of improvement
Work collaboratively with Sales & Marketing to strengthen GTM and achieving commercial success (net POS growth)
Provide insightful data analysis and strategic
customer service data, observations and market trends and reports to get a clear picture of the department's operations and ways to improve it.
tasked with providing the department with process or sales improvement strategies. They will often work closely with subject matter experts, marketing teams or management to develop and implement plans.
Drive CDI and programs to better engage customers & build LN brand
Engage with external key stakeholders to gather market intelligence, drive strategic relationship, and develop business opportunities
Develop and run programs for customer value-add and drive loyalty and brand awareness
Drive CDI and focus group sessions to assist with product development and improvement initiatives, and to increase account value and customer dollar spend
Provide the right training sessions to induce more customers’ usage
Develop, plan and conduct onboarding, refresher and relevant training courses to drive adoption and usage of LN’s product, solution and content
Develop resource and material (online,digital media) to be used for education, customer training and sales enablement purpose
Develop customer engagement strategy and execute accordingly
Conducts sales training needs assessments, sales enablement sessions and analyzes employee training needs to determine requirements for new program development
Requirements
Bachelor’s Degree with legal qualification
Understanding of SEA’s legal market and legal persona
Independent ownership of work streams/projects and deliverables is a pre-requisite
Excellent communication, influencing and interpersonal skills
Experience in customer engagement, strong probing skills to understand customers’ pain points
Excellent working knowledge of Excel, PowerPoint, CRM and reporting tools
A strong analytical thinker with attention to detail in reports, and financial and operational analysis. and interpretation of information and statistical indicators
A strong ability to collaborate internally with people across sales and corporate responsibilities.
A passion for commercial processes and systems that are effective and run efficiently
Work in a way that works for you
We promote a healthy work/life balance across the organisation. We offer an appealing working prospect for our people. With numerous wellbeing initiatives, shared parental leave, study assistance and sabbaticals, we will help you meet your immediate responsibilities and your long-term goals.
Working for you
We know that your wellbeing and happiness are key to a long and successful career. These are some of the benefits we are delighted to offer:
Life Assurance Policies: Providing financial security for your loved ones.
Long Service Award: Recognition for your dedication and loyalty.
Access to Learning and Development Resources: Empowering your professional growth
Hybrid work arrangements: Balance work and personal life effectively.
Access to Learning and Development Resources: Empowering your professional growth.
About the Business
LexisNexis Legal & Professional® provides legal, regulatory, and business information and analytics that help customers increase their productivity, improve decision-making, achieve better outcomes, and advance the rule of law around the world. As a digital pioneer, the company was the first to bring legal and business information online with its Lexis® and Nexis® services

Title: Partnership Operation Manager, AI Data Service and Operations - Trust and Safety
Full Job Description:
Responsibilities
Building a world where people can safely discover, create and connect. The Trust & Safety (T&S) team at TikTok helps ensure that our global online community is safe and empowered to create and enjoy content across all of our applications. We have invested heavily in human and machine-based moderation to remove harmful content quickly and often before it reaches our general community.
What will I be doing? The AI Data Service and Operations (ADSO) team is responsible for providing safety and non-safety data annotation services and search operation services for all of the company's international products, which can also help international products build their own data ecological security.
As a Partner Operation Manager, you will own the partner/vendor relationship for outsourcing performance including monitoring delivery, vendor performance management. This includes identifying operational and performance risks and mitigations proactively within the assigned sites and/or lines of businesses. It is possible that this role will be exposed to harmful content as part of the core role/as part of project/ in response to escalation requests/by chance.
This may occur in the form of images, video, and text related to every-day life, but it can also include (but is not limited to) bullying; hate speech; child safety; depictions of harm to self and others, and harm to animals. Responsibilities
You will be responsible for ensuring AI Data Labeling program/project is successful through strong service delivery of core SLAs/KPIs/goals (Productivity, Quality, Latency, Wellness, etc).
You will be responsible for holding the partner/vendor site accountable and helping a set clear path towards operational excellence.
You will be responsible for managing complex vendor and internal stakeholder relationships and ensure adherence to standard operating procedures.
You will be responsible for ensuring adherence to budget and accurate financial accounting of vendor partner production, training, and other expenses.
You will be responsible for platform housekeeping and Permission Management: Resources management to ensure resources accounts are good to use and remove for project start and end; Control the permission to platform, and solve queue permission issues, if any.
You will be responsible for doing research on the market and language to better understand and manage specific projects.
The ability to travel around 30% is required for this role.
Qualifications
Minimum Qualifications 1. Bachelor's degree, or equivalent with minimum of 2 years of experience managing outsourced partner relationships along with people management experience 2. Proven ability in Operations Management along with experience in large-scale operations working across or coordinating with multiple domains and business units
3. Proven ability in Program Management, Large scale transformation project experience along with experience in managing multiple responsibilities simultaneously and effectively, and efficiently prioritizing and meeting deadlines 4. Proven experience in operational excellence and ability to focus on continuous improvement by re-engineering site-level processes as needed (i.e. wfm, floor management, workload prioritization, etc.) 5. Proven ability to articulate business performance and any remediation plans to an executive level.
6. Strong oral and written communication along with proven ability to influence skills to be able to navigate a global organization, influence stakeholders, and affect outcomes. Preferred Qualifications 1. Experience in labeling / data annotation /AI data operations
2. Regional/global working experience 3. Prior working experience in a BPO / Social Media / Call center environment is an advantage. 4. You have the ability to think outside the box, multitask and work well under pressure, identify issues, and work to resolve them in partnership with business leaders
5. Your ability to work in a high tempo environment, adapt, respond to day-to-day challenges of the role. 6. Your resilience and commitment to self-care to manage the emotional demands of the role.

Title: Senior Cybersecurity Engineering Specialist
Full Job Description:
Company description:
CelcomDigi Berhad (Registration No. 199701009694 (425190-X)) is Malaysia's widest and fastest network with more than 20 million users on our network. Officially established on 30th November 2022, we aim to serve the growing digital needs of our customers by leveraging our newly combined widest network footprint, distribution touchpoints, innovative range of digital products and services, and superior customer experience powered by over 4,000 top industry experts. We have clearly defined ambitions to advance the nation, inspire Malaysian society, and be a leader in inclusion and responsible business practices.
Job description:
This role requires a seasoned cybersecurity professional with strong technical expertise, leadership skills, and the ability to drive security engineering initiatives at an enterprise level.
Job Description
Lead the design, implementation, paperwork, and continuous enhancement of cybersecurity engineering solutions to address evolving threats and business needs.
Define and implement security frameworks, standards, and best practices aligned with industry benchmarks and regulatory requirements from CS Architecture and Engineering perspective.
Lead the integration of DevSecOps principles into the software development lifecycle, ensuring security is embedded from design to deployment.
Design and implement cloud security strategies, ensuring secure architecture and compliance for cloud-native applications and hybrid environments.
Evaluate, recommend, and drive the adoption of advanced security technologies to enhance the organization's security posture.
Provide technical leadership and SME in threat modeling, security automation, and security architecture.
Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders, not limited to: IT, risk management, compliance, vendors, and partners, to ensure security requirements are met.
Drive the development of security solution blueprints, ensuring alignment with enterprise architecture and IT infrastructure.
PM or Project coordinator for cybersecurity infrastructure deployments, ensuring seamless integration with existing environments and optimized security controls.
Familiar in-depth security assessments, vulnerability analysis, and risk mitigation planning for enterprise systems.
Develop and implement security automation strategies to improve efficiency, threat detection, and response capabilities.
Provide mentorship and technical guidance to cybersecurity engineering teams, fostering a culture of innovation and security excellence.
Support the development of cybersecurity strategic and tactical plans, ensuring alignment with the organization's goals and security roadmap.
Ensure seamless transition from cybersecurity engineering to operations, including documentation, knowledge transfer, and training.
Continuously monitor and analyze emerging cybersecurity threats, trends, and best practices to proactively strengthen security defenses.
Requirements
Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Engineering, Cybersecurity, or a related field. A Master's degree is preferred.
Min 5 years of experience in cybersecurity engineering, architecture, and solutioning, with a proven track record of technical leadership.
Industry certifications such as CCSP,CISSP, CCSK,CISM, OSCP, TOGAF, or equivalent security technology certifications (e.g., Cloud Security, Firewall, IDS/IPS, PIM/PAM, IAM, Zero Trust).
Expertise in designing and implementing enterprise security solutions across networks, cloud environments, and applications.
Extensive hands-on experience in security architecture, threat modeling, and cybersecurity automation.
Strong understanding of cloud security frameworks (AWS, Azure, GCP) and experience in securing hybrid cloud environments.
Experience with cybersecurity engineering disciplines, including:Security Architecture & Solutioning (Min 2 years), Cybersecurity Technology Implementation (Min 2 years), Security Operations & Incident Response (Min 2 years), Cybersecurity Design & Planning (Min 1 year)
Strong knowledge of security frameworks, such as NIST, ISO 27001, MITRE ATT&CK, and regulatory compliance (e.g., GDPR, PCI-DSS, SOC 2).
Deep understanding of Zero Trust principles, Cloud Security, Identity & Access Management (IAM), Privileged Access Management (PAM), and Next-Gen Firewalls.
Hands-on experience with security automation, SIEM, SOAR, and advanced threat intelligence platforms or any security controls are advantageous.
Strong leadership, communication, and stakeholder management skills, with experience presenting cybersecurity strategies to senior management.
Ability to handle complex security challenges, drive innovation, and influence cybersecurity strategy within the organization.
Next Steps
Thank you for taking the first step towards joining our team at CelcomDigi! After submitting your application, our Talent Acquisition team will review your CV and reach out to shortlisted candidates to guide you through the next steps, including a pre-screening conversation, interviews and or assessments.
At CelcomDigi, we aspire to be Malaysia's leading telco-tech company — the nation's digital growth engine — powering transformation through 5G, AI, and innovation that impacts over 20 million customers. Here, your role goes beyond work. It's about enabling businesses to thrive, connecting communities, and advancing society, as we build a brand rooted in trust, reliability and customer excellence. Aligned with our employer value proposition, Grow with Purpose. Build with Trust, you'll have the opportunity to innovate responsibly and create digital solutions that truly make a difference. If you're driven, future focused, and ready to be part of something bigger, we want you on our team.
Let's advance and inspire Malaysia together! #WeAreCelcomDigi
Follow CelcomDigi on LinkedIn and vote for us as Malaysia's Most Preferred Employer at the GRADUAN Brand Awards.
CelcomDigi is an equal opportunity employer, and committed to promote employment practices that are transparent, objective and fair.

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Full Job Description:
Responsibilities:
Develops and refines machine learning models to solve specific business problems (Model Training)
Conducts feature engineering to enhance model performance and represent data optimally
Performs hyperparameter tuning to optimize model performance
Designs and implements ML pipelines that sequence different steps for optimal results (e.g., model training, evaluation, data transformation)
Selects appropriate algorithms based on problem requirements, data characteristics, and performance criteria
Analyzes data to uncover trends, patterns, and insights
Considers and accounts for data drift over time to ensure models remain effective in production
Conducts prompt engineering to improve performance of models requiring natural language inputs
Ensures quality through model evaluation and rigorous testing of results
Estimates costs for ML-related tasks, including project offers and change requests
Collaborates with business stakeholders to deeply understand the business case behind the ML model and its expected outcomes
Requirements:
Strong knowledge of machine learning algorithms, hyperparameter tuning, and model evaluation
Experience with prompt engineering and natural language processing (NLP) tasks
Proficiency in Python
Familiarity with ML libraries such as TensorFlow, Scikit-learn, and PyTorch
Knowledge of data analysis techniques, feature engineering, and data preparation
Understanding of ML pipelines and workflow automation
Ability to detect and address data drift in production environments
Strong problem-solving and analytical thinking skills
Experience working with stakeholders to understand and refine business cases
Familiarity with cost estimation and budget management for ML projects
Excellent communication skills to convey technical insights in business terms
Continuous learning mindset, staying updated with the latest in AI/ML technologies
Strong problem-solving and analytical thinking skills.
Experience working with stakeholders to understand and refine business cases.
Continuous learning mindset, staying updated with the latest in AI/ML technologies.
Primary Skills:
Core Libraries: Python 3.11+, pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn
Deep Learning: TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch
Natural Language Processing: (Azure) OpenAI, Prompt Engineering, transformers, Langchain
Development & Deployment: Git, Docker
Data Visualization & Application: Streamlit, Matplotlib
Azure: Azure Cognitive Services, Azure Databricks
Secondary Skills:
Azure Databases & Data Services: Azure Cosmos DB, Azure Data Factory

Title: Sales Development Representative
Full Job Description:
Our Client, a thriving SaaS startup that is experiencing rapid growth thanks to the support of renowned investors like Alibaba Entrepreneurs Fund and Tiger Global. Their product is an all-in-one Omnichannel Conversation Suite that drives conversions through conversations with their platform's ability to seamlessly integrate with channels such as WhatsApp, Messenger, Instagram, WeChat, Email, and more.
If you're passionate about using AI to drive businesses, this role is for you!
Role
An ambitious Outbound Sales Development Representative to join our Client's dynamic sales team. As an SDR, you will build and manage prospect relationships to drive revenue. A vital part of this opportunity is partnering with the Customer Success and Product team to ensure the quality and quantity of sales pipeline.
Responsibilities
Handle sales conversion process for Small & Medium Businesses
Developing and managing relationships within Commercial segment with clients in Malaysia
Forecast sales activity and revenue achievement while creating satisfied and reference-able customers
Research and build >40 "cold accounts" (i.e.: adding contacts, sending emails, cold calling) everyday
Support our inbound and outbound sales teams in closing enterprise clients
Involve in our International Market Expansion
Work with cross-functional teams in Hong Kong, Singapore, Brazil and oversee the market launch project
Ability to stay up to date in the SaaS landscape and demonstrate our platform value
Requirements
Outbound sales or sales development experience (selling over the phone, cold calling)
Candidates with previous B2B experience preferred
Extensive experience selling to customers in Malaysia with strong customer references
Candidates with experience in CRM & other marketing tools preferred
Consistently over-achieved quota (top 5-10% of the company) in past positions.
Strong computer skills, including CRM, Microsoft Word, PowerPoint, and Excel.
Benefits
Competitive base package with 13-month salary
High on-target earnings
Share option in a hyper-growth startup
Birthday Leave
Team lunch allowances
Fun and diverse culture
International team environment

Title: Senior DevOps Engineer
Full Job Description:
Quantios is a global leader in SaaS solutions for the Wealth, Trust, and Corporate Services (TCSP) industry. Focused on driving digital transformation, Quantios provides advanced technology that ensures seamless compliance and efficient administration. Our solutions empower businesses to streamline operations and focus on growth.
The TCSP industry is undergoing rapid consolidation and increasing regulatory scrutiny, making data integrity more critical than ever. Quantios leverages AI, automation, and advanced technology to manage data with precision, supporting growth, compliance, and operational efficiency for over 600 clients globally.
Join a team of 300+ professionals across 12 offices worldwide, and be part of a company driving transformation in over 80 international jurisdictions, where your expertise will help shape the future of this fast-changing industry.
Overview/Summary
Reporting to the DevOps Manager, the DevOps Engineer will be responsible for the design, implementation and operation of all hosted environments and infrastructure within Quantios. As part of a broader program of investment in our software products and services we are building a DevOps competency and this role will define our DevOps processes, tooling and environments.
Initially focussed on providing managed service offerings for internal customers (for example, hosting demo environments for the sales team and CICD infrastructure for the development team), the role will expand to provide the technical launch of our Quantios Online SaaS offering, based on the Business Central Online platform.
Job Description:
Design, implementation and operation of cloud environments (Azure and AWS) for hosting Quantios products for internal use and for customer sandbox environments (non-production)
Similar for CICD environments for Quantios development teams
Play a pivotal role in the launch and ongoing delivery of our brand-new SaaS offering, through close collaboration with Quantios strategy & innovation, development and product management teams
Collaboration with Quantios development teams to establish, implement and monitor working practices necessary for effective continuous delivery
Collaboration with the IT team to ensure all automation and monitoring aligns with current best practice procedures and tooling
Creation of appropriate health monitoring and alerting for managed services
Secure system by establishing and enforcing policies; defining, monitoring access, server hardening.
Development of automation for infrastructure provisioning
Collaboration with Quantios development teams to design and establish health monitoring and alerting for Quantios products running in the managed service environment
Development of ITIL practices for hosted services together with active engagement in an ISMS program
Job Requirements:
5+ years’ experience in a DevOps environment delivering SaaS offering. Additional 3+ years’ experience as a software developer on agile software projects
Experience with commercial software, ideally in a secure environment or highly-regulated business domain
Proficient in containerizing and orchestrating web services
Familiarity with n-tier architecture concepts including RESTful API services
Familiarity with CI/CD tooling
Demonstrated strong interest in Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
Awareness of cloud-based hosting options (Azure, AWS, GCP)
Hands on experience in the operational delivery of commercial SaaS offerings
Familiarity with ITIL frameworks
Experience of ISO27001, including associated management systems
Relevant Microsoft Azure certifications will be considered an added advantage
