Title: Technical lead - react.js, node.js
Full Job Description:
Job description:
About HCLTech
HCLTech is a global technology company, spread across 60 countries, delivering industry-leading capabilities centered around digital, engineering, cloud and AI, powered by a broad portfolio of technology services and products. We work with clients across all major verticals, providing industry solutions for Financial Services, Manufacturing, Life Sciences and Healthcare, Technology and Services, Telecom and Media, Retail and CPG, and Public Services. We re powered by our people a global, diverse, multi-generational talent - representing 161 nationalities whose unique spark, perspective and boundless passion drive our culture of proactive value creation and problem-solving.
Our purpose is to bring together the best of technology and our people to supercharge progress for everyone, everywhere our clients, partners, their stakeholders, communities, and the planet. As a company, we are deeply focused on accelerating our ESG agenda. We are also creating technology-enabled sustainable solutions with and for our clients and partners. We embed ESG imperatives into every aspect of our business and ensure that the progress we supercharge is responsible, inclusive and beneficial to all our stakeholders in the long term. We have committed to achieving net zero by 2040.
To learn more about how we can supercharge progress for you, visit www.hcltech.com
Technical Lead - React.js
Job Summary
As a Technical Lead specializing in React.js, you will play a pivotal role in managing technology within projects and providing insightful technical guidance and solutions to drive successful project completion. Your expertise will be crucial in enhancing team capabilities, ensuring process compliance, and fostering an environment of best practices and innovation.
Key Responsibilities
1. Provide Technical Guidance And Solutions By Defining, Advocating, And Implementing Best Practices And Coding Standards In React.Js Development, Ensuring High-Quality Outputs From The Team.
2. Develop And Enhance The Technical Skills Of Team Members By Conducting Training Sessions And Code Reviews, Ultimately Increasing Productivity And Fostering A Culture Of Continuous Improvement.
3. Ensure Process Compliance Within The Assigned Module By Actively Participating In Technical Discussions And Reviews As A Consultant For Feasibility Studies, Evaluating Technical Alternatives, And Assessing Technical Risks.
4. Prepare And Submit Detailed Status Reports To Minimize Exposure And Risks On The Project, Actively Managing Escalations And Ensuring Timely Resolution Of Technical Challenges.
Skill Requirements
1. Strong Understanding Of React.Js With Practical Experience In Building Scalable Web Applications.
2. Proficient In Javascript, Html, And Css, Demonstrating A Solid Grasp Of Front-End Development Principles.
3. Familiarity With Node.Js For Full-Stack Application Development.
4. In-Depth Knowledge Of State Management Libraries (E.G., Redux) And Modern Front-End Build Tools (E.G., Webpack, Babel).
5. Good Understanding Of Restful Services And Apis, Ensuring Effective Integration With Back-End Systems.
Certification
1. Optional But Valuable Certifications: React.Js Certification, Certified Scrummaster (Csm), Or Similar Agile Methodologies Certifications.

Title: Product Owner - Large Projects Sales Solutions
Full Job Description:
What's the role?
We are looking for an IT Product Owner defining and managing all sales related IT projects and solutions, working towards achieving our vision of a seamless, connected and SAP based IT landscape for Large Project business at Hilti. To complement our team, we are seeking for an IT Product Owner to plan, manage and deliver digitalization projects.
Your role drives the build-up of a team and processes to sustainable manage the sales solutions area within the Large Projects program. You will strongly contribute to one of our core initiatives out of our new corporate strategy shaping the future towards “Make Construction
Better”.
Who is Hilti?
Join Hilti – A Great Place to Work 2024 & ranked as Asia’s 4th Best Workplaces.
At Hilti, innovation drives everything we do. We’re committed to improving productivity, safety, and sustainability in the global construction industry and beyond. Our strong customer relationships help us create solutions that truly build a better future.
With over 120 locations worldwide, we take pride in fostering a deep sense of belonging that extends into our lives and homes . At Hilti Asia IT Services, we’re at the forefront of digital transformation in construction, aligned with our mission of Making Construction
Better. As the IT backbone of Hilti, we empower over 34,000 employees across 120+ countries, delivering cutting-edge solutions to enhance productivity globally.
Based in Malaysia, we collaborate with global teams, utilizing the latest technologies in software development, analytics, IT infrastructure, and design engineering to drive transformative initiatives.
Our people are our greatest strength, and our Great Place to Work 2024 recognition celebrates our commitment to a culture that values care, performance, and innovation. We offer competitive rewards and comprehensive career development opportunities that ensure your success is our priority.
Come be a part of our journey and make a lasting impact!
What does the role involve?
As the IT Product Owner – Large Projects Sales solutions you will shape the future processes and IT solutions to improve step by step the areas of our offerings towards our customers within Large Projects. In line with our IT and Business project teams you will define, deliver, and run solutions contributing to our vision.
This innovative position requires business understanding, IT know-how, project & portfolio management skills as well as strong competences to implement and operate these solutions. One of the most dynamic and diverse IT challenges is waiting for you. This position will be responsible for leading and supporting new business solutions based on latest technologies, e.g. Salesforce.com, SAP S/4 HANA.
Following new trends surrounding Engineer-to-Order and digital sales solutions within the project business, analyzing their values, and implementing them at Hilti are additional parts of that innovation leading role.
Key responsibilities:
Master communication and manage all stakeholders within the Large Projects Sales solutions
Orchestrate the portfolio of all sales and customer related projects/initiatives around Large Projects at Hilti
Develop technical solutions, sustainable processes, and standards in this area
Drive standardization, centralization, and contribute to digitalization initiatives
Build-up sustainable support structures to operate the created solutions and processes (incl. documentation)
Actively manage 3rd party vendor(s), local suppliers, and providers in your area
Strongly collaborate with other Large project areas
We have an excellent mix of people, which we believe makes for a more vibrant, more innovative and more productive team.
What do we offer?
At Hilti, we believe in a caring and performance-oriented culture. Our people are our greatest strength, and our Great Place to Work 2024 recognition celebrates our commitment to a culture that values care, performance, and innovation. We offer competitive rewards and comprehensive career development opportunities that ensure your success is our priority. Click on the link to know more https://careers.hilti.group/en/where-we-are/kuala-lumpur-malaysia/
What you need is:
Master’s degree (or equivalent) in Information Systems, Computer Science, or in a related field (PhD is a plus)
5+ years of relevant work experience in IT (SAP, Salesforce.com), Sales solutions and Customer Relationship Mgmt
Experience in Engineer-to-Order environments with a project driven context is a clear plus
Willingness to work closely with business counterparts and good stakeholder management & communication skills
Entrepreneurial attitude – taking responsibility in understanding topics, owning them, and delivering success
Product/Project Management – experience in managing multiple projects and initiatives in your area in a portfolio way as well as end-to-end project delivery experience
Skills in manging product related topics like backlog, budget, vendors, externals and internal resources
Fluent in English (verbal and written), German is a plus
Why should you apply?
At Hilti, we’re leading the digital transformation in the construction industry. With our innovative technologies, we’re pushing the boundaries of what's possible—whether it's through advanced software development, data-driven solutions, or state-of-the-art IT infrastructure. By joining our team, you’ll be part of a dynamic environment where technology meets real-world impact, enabling smarter, more efficient, and safer construction processes worldwide.
We offer:
Cutting-edge projects that utilize the latest in AI, cloud computing, and advanced analytics.
A chance to work with global teams on solutions that are shaping the future of construction.
Continuous learning and development opportunities to grow your skills in the rapidly evolving tech landscape.
If you’re passionate about technology and ready to make an impact in an industry that’s critical to shaping the world around us, Hilti Asia IT Services is the place for you!
Interested for the role?
Click through the 'Apply Now' button where you will be asked to upload your CV and answer a couple of short questions – the whole process should take around 90 seconds. If we like what we see, you'll be invited to a telephone interview.
If we don't have a suitable role for you at the moment, we will keep you in our talent pool for the future so your recruitment process might take a bit longer but we'll be sure to stay in touch.
#JoinHiltiAsiaITServices
Looking forward to hearing from you!

Title: Product Manager
Full Job Description:
SUMMARY OF RESPONSIBILITIES
PayNet is the leading national payment network company at the forefront of revolutionizing payments, driving innovation, and transforming the way financial transactions are conducted as we shape and advance the digital payment landscape in Malaysia. Our mission is to provide secure, efficient, and innovative payment solutions to our participants, businesses and consumers in Malaysia. As we continue to expand and enhance our offerings, we are seeking a talented, driven and customer-focused Product Manager to join our dynamic team.
You will be expected to achieve by:
Responsible for steering the strategic direction of the product, from identifying market opportunities to creating innovative solutions and driving revenue growth. They oversee the entire product lifecycle, ensuring alignment with business objectives, and addressing market needs effectively.
Spearheading participant and consumer service enablement, ensuring maximum market penetration across consumer and business segments. Your role involves strategically creating new payment experiences and channels, leveraging existing unified product platforms to bridge market gaps. Collaborating with commercial teams and providers, you drive revenue growth by exploring new channels and tapping into previously underserved segments.
Owning of the product roadmap, prioritization, and backlog management falls within your domain. You define propositions, craft UX frameworks, and establish product requirements, aligning them with market demands and user needs to ensure product excellence and customer satisfaction.
Lead co-creation activities with stakeholders, including Commercial, Operations and Technology Division towards defining enhanced product propositions.
Ownership of product roadmap through prioritization of use cases & enhancements based on impact and business goal.
Defining project scope, objectives, impact, user experiences, deliverables, and timelines in collaboration with stakeholders and project teams
Request for resource allocation through the Planning and Demand Management team in Technology Division
Translating business requirements to user stories, acceptance criteria, and prioritization of development tasks in collaboration with the application development teams or vendors.
Continuously monitor and analyze product performance, user feedback, and market trends to identify opportunities for improvement and inform future product iterations.
QUALIFICATIONS
Bachelor's degree in business administration, computer science, or a related field. Advanced degree preferred.
Proven experience (10 years) as a Product Manager or similar role in the financial services, fintech or payment industry, preferably with exposure to payment products in an operational role.
Good understanding of payment systems, technologies, and industry standards.
Excellent research and analytical skills, with the ability to gather and interpret market insights and customer needs.
Demonstrated ability to collaborate effectively with cross functional teams and in stakeholder management and engagement, with the ability to influence and build relationships at various levels.
Knowledge of risk management, compliance, and regulatory requirements related to payment networks.
Experience in developing project proposals, business cases, and financial analysis to secure funding.
Familiarity with agile methodologies and experience collaborating with technology teams to define product specifications and user stories.
Excellent communication skills, with the ability to convey complex concepts and ideas in a clear and concise manner.
Strong organizational skills, with the ability to manage multiple projects and prioritize effectively.
Passion for innovation and staying abreast of emerging technologies and industry trends.
Advantageous Skills:
Passion around operations with clear understanding of its importance to day to day business activities
Ability to read and optimize API documents towards enabling developers to self-serve and understand its requirements clearly through a developer portal
Experience in data analytics and leveraging customer insights to drive product enhancements.
Strong understanding of local payment regulations and compliance
Experience in conducting user research and usability testing to inform design decisions
Experience in working with external vendors for product/software development
Understanding of generative AI technologies in enabling self-serve models especially on system integration and software development
APPLY

Title: IT Business Analyst- SAP SD/ SAP ERP
Full Job Description:
What's the role?
​We are looking for an IT Business Analyst who will work in SAP Sales and Distribution (SD) area. You will contribute to build end to end digital solutions in our application landscape with a backend based on SAP S/4HANA and SAP BTP (Business Technology Platform) systems. In close collaboration with our business counterparts, other IT departments and external partners, you will leverage on our portfolio of SAP and further cloud/on-premises products to accomplish visionary business objectives in Market Reach and Logistics for more than 50 Hilti organizations worldwide.​
Who is Hilti?
Join Hilti – A Great Place to Work 2024 & ranked as Asia’s 4th Best Workplaces.
At Hilti, innovation drives everything we do. We’re committed to improving productivity, safety, and sustainability in the global construction industry and beyond. Our strong customer relationships help us create solutions that truly build a better future. With over 120 locations worldwide, we take pride in fostering a deep sense of belonging that extends into our lives and homes.

In this role, you identify, analyze and implement business requirements for innovative retail and service processes a focus on repair solution on a global scale based on user needs and strategic requirements,
By advocating repair order creation solution and managing stakeholders throughout the global matrix organization, you interact with all IT functions as well as internal and external business partners in an agile setup. The team you are in is part of our strategic program to improve customer experience
with a long-range roadmap for the next years. Join us and be part of the team collaborating in a leading-edge work environment and help us continue to outperform our competition.

At Hilti, we believe in a caring and performance-oriented culture. Our people are our greatest strength, and our Great Place to Work 2024 recognition celebrates our commitment to a culture that values care, performance, and innovation. We offer competitive rewards and comprehensive career development opportunities that ensure your success is our priority. Click on the link to know more Kuala Lumpur | Hilti Careers

More than 5 years of working experience as an SAP Business Analyst or in a similar role.

Knowledge and experience in SAP S/4HANA and/or SAP BTP (Business Technology Platform) will be advantageous
Experience in analysis, design, planning, implementing and roll out of end-to-end solutions.
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to under complex business processes and translate them into system solutions.

Strong interpersonal skills and team player approach with the ability to connect with global partners to bond, inspire, influence and accomplish goals

Title: Business Excellence Manager (SAP Oder Management)) )
Full Job Description:
Job Purpose
This position locates in Kuala Lumpur, meanwhile job will cover to all the countries in APAC region.
The Business Excellence Manager is responsible to support and accelerate the success of progress initiatives in commercial and operation process by upgrading the SAP transition with continues improvement mindset and building up the related knowledge foundations for the long-term maintenance.
Main Tasks and Responsibilities
SAP Project Management:
Drive SAP related process improvement projects and serve as a sparring partner for our SAP key users in the countries. The Business Excellence Manager is the leader/key player:
To support the global SAP S4HANA project deployment in APAC in 2025 and 2026. He/she will work with regional project leader to track the regional test scenarios, cases and data, contribute to setup template/local test scope with the cooperation between global project team. In the meantime, he/she need to support Local Key User for the testing the acceptance of local business processes during the UAT, Integration Test.
To lead the APAC O2C (Order to Cash) project with the support from global team to improve the current CS process by optimizing the SAP transitions to achieve the benchmark level.
To support COE (Customer service's Centre of Excellence) build-up with the support from regional project leader to create an alliance and support-system for our customer service team members in countries and secure talents for our future. It includes to share the SAP technical benchmark function, lead local markets CS teams to test and act, plus build up the necessary regional SOP or other similar ways to guarantee the continues knowledge upgrading.
BE Transformation:
The Business Excellence Manager is a continues improvement thinker to influence the different levels of people toward to the Business Excellence Model.
Drive highest level of Customer Service and Logistics performance, securing productivity gains, lead cross-functional to improve end to end processes and enhance customer satisfaction.
Work closely with all countries, departments and monitor key initiatives’ progress so that any deviations or issues could be resolved on-time.
Facilitate actions or projects to improve/optimize all relevant management processes.
Support CS 1st level of trouble shooting ticket before it goes to IT.
Any other tasks that the supervisor may assign from time to time.
Requirements needed
Education and experience
Bachelor’s degree or above with more than 10 years of working experiences.
5-7 years of experiences in Customer Services, technical support, customer insights, or customer service fields.
Rich experience with SAP SD (sales and distribution module) is a must to be able to support the O2C initiatives in the countries.
Experiences with SAP launch is preferred to be able to lead the SAP testing as the super user.
Experiences as the project leader with Project management skill like PMP or Scrum is preferred.
Experiences with improving the SAP processes related with P2P (Procure to Pay) and R2R (Record to Report) is a plus.
Digital mindset and knowledge in emerging digital technologies (e.g. PowerBI, RPA, AI etc.)  is an asset.
Expertise in Microsoft Excel is essential.
Fluent in English.
Personal Attributes
With the continues improvement mindset, always challenge the AS IS using an internal or external benchmark.
Willing to work under pressure to build the processes from 0 to 1.
Strong analytical skills together with business acumen.
Good communication and collaboration skills.  Ability to partner with and influence others without direct authority, build consensus, and look for collaboration with people from different departments and all levels.
Highly organized and well prepared.
Ability to work on tight deadlines and prioritize.
Travel time in APAC region 15% - 20%.

Title: Lead Product Manager, Business Platform
Full Job Description:
Get to Know the Team
Business Platform Tech Family (BP TF) is a platform TF with the mission to create an easy-to-use platform that empowers every business in Southeast Asia to connect, engage, and transact with Grab consumers.
Get to Know the Role
We are seeking an experienced and data-driven Lead Product Manager to join our Business Platform team. This is an individual contributor role focused on empowering our valued merchant partners. You will oversee the strategy, development, and optimization of products and features designed to help merchants better understand their business performance, unlock growth opportunities, and operate more efficiently on our platform. This is a critical position with a significant impact on our merchant ecosystem.
The Critical Tasks You Will Perform
Develop and own the product vision, strategy, and roadmap for key areas within the merchant growth and efficiency domain.
Deeply understand merchant needs and pain points through direct user research (interviews, surveys, usability testing) and data analysis.
Translate insights into clear product requirements, user stories, and specifications.
Leverage strong analytical skills to analyze merchant data, identify trends, and measure product impact.
Define, monitor, and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs) through experimentation to drive product decisions and measure merchant success.
Collaborate closely with your cross-functional team comprising both Tech and Business Stakeholders
Embrace AI and LLM in your daily work and product design.

Title: Linux Engineer
Full Job Description:
What's the role?
As a Linux Engineer, you are part of our global Compute & Operating Platforms team, based in Kuala Lumpur (Malaysia). You get to work in an agile Global IT Enterprise Platforms team, with a focus on Linux Server operating systems engineering.
Who is Hilti?
At Hilti, innovation drives everything we do. We’re committed to improving productivity, safety, and sustainability in the global construction industry and beyond. Our strong customer relationships help us create solutions that truly build a better future. With over 120 locations worldwide, we take pride in fostering a deep sense of belonging that extends into our lives and homes.
At Hilti Asia IT Services, we’re at the forefront of digital transformation in construction, aligned with our mission of Making Construction Better. As the IT backbone of Hilti, we empower over 34,000 employees across 120+ countries, delivering cutting-edge solutions to enhance productivity globally.
Based in Malaysia, we collaborate with global teams, utilizing the latest technologies in software development, analytics, IT infrastructure, and design engineering to drive transformative initiatives.
Our people are our greatest strength, and our Great Place to Work 2024 recognition celebrates our commitment to a culture that values care, performance, and innovation. We offer competitive rewards and comprehensive career development opportunities that ensure your success is our priority.
Come be a part of our journey and make a lasting impact!
What does the role involve?
In this role you get an opportunity to:
• Play a key role in maintaining and developing the server operating platform portfolio of Hilti.
• Leverage your experience and know-how to ensure we maintain an evergreen landscape.
• Take advantage of the latest innovations in the field, while adhering to the industry best practices and security standards.
• Be involved in all stages of the operating system’s life cycle; starting with engineering the new operating system adhering to Hilti’s standards, taking ownership in supporting application owners and daily operations, ending with the life cycle replacement and decommissioning of the servers.
• Work closely with architecture and cybersecurity teams, as well as vertical IT teams representing our business stakeholders to understand and meet their requirements.
• Collaborate with other engineers in the team and lead Linux Server engineering activities and take responsibility for its performance.
We have an excellent mix of people, which we believe makes for a more vibrant, more innovative and more productive team.
What do we offer?
At Hilti, we believe in a caring and performance-oriented culture. Our people are our greatest strength, and our Great Place to Work 2024 recognition celebrates our commitment to a culture that values care, performance, and innovation. We offer competitive rewards and comprehensive career development opportunities that ensure your success is our priority.
Click on the link to know more: https://careers.hilti.group/en/where-we-are/kuala-lumpur-malaysia/
What you need is:
• Degree or Master's in Information Technology, Computer Science, Engineering, or other technical discipline.
• Minimum of 5 years of experience working in senior Linux Server operating system engineering roles.
• Deep knowledge in Linux scripting and managing infrastructure as a code.
• Experience in designing, planning, and implementing CI/CD pipelines. Know-how of GitLab is an advantage.
• Understanding of Linux security, advisories, and CVE, SCAP compliance.
• Preferred experience in Red Hat Satellite and Puppet.
• Know-how in Microsoft Azure cloud technologies is an advantage.
• Self-organizing personality equipped with good analytical and structured problem-solving skills.
• Open mindset for learning new infrastructure technologies, scripting and agile tools and processes.
• Excellent English communication skills with a motivation to work in a multicultural team located globally spanning multiple time zones.
Why should you apply?
At Hilti, we’re leading the digital transformation in the construction industry. With our innovative technologies, we’re pushing the boundaries of what's possible—whether it's through advanced software development, data driven solutions, or state-of-the-art IT infrastructure. By joining our team, you’ll be part of a dynamic environment where technology meets real-world impact, enabling smarter, more efficient, and safer construction processes worldwide.
We offer:
• Cutting-edge projects that utilize the latest in AI, cloud computing, and advanced analytics.
• A chance to work with global teams on solutions that are shaping the future of construction.
• Continuous learning and development opportunities to grow your skills in the rapidly evolving tech landscape.
If you’re passionate about technology and ready to make an impact in an industry that’s critical to shaping the world around us,
Hilti Asia IT Services is the place for you
Click through the 'Apply Now'button where you will be asked to upload your CV and answer a couple of short questions–the whole process should take around 90 seconds. If we like what we see, you'll be invited to a telephone interview.
If we don't have a suitable role for you at the moment, we will keep you in our talent pool for the future so your recruitment process might take a bit longer but we'll be sure to stay in touch.

Title: Internship – Mobile App & Website Developer
Full Job Description:
Job Scope:
We are looking for a highly motivated mobile app & website developer to join our team. The successful candidate will be responsible to assists senior developer to test and enhance the under-development mobile apps and websites. Candidate will have a chance to involved in every stage of software development life cycle (SDLC) from designing, integrating, testing, and implementing.
Job Description:
Design mobile app front-end (UI) by using React Native.
Design website front-end (UI) by using React or .Net Core.
Identify system bugs and propose solution to solve the bugs.
Assist senior developer to debug some minor problem.
Assist senior developer to R&D useful React Native libraries.
Preparing test script for different test scenarios.
Performing positive test and negative test to different test scenarios.
Requirements & Qualifications:
Diploma or Bachelor Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineer or equivalent related field.
Required skill(s): Html, CSS, JavaScript, NodeJS, ReactJS.
Desirable skill(s): React Native, Objective-C/Swift, Microsoft Word (documentation skill).
Candidate familiar with mobile development frameworks such as React Native, Xamarin, Flutter or
familiar with mobile app development tools such as Android Studio, Xcode will be an added advantage.
Candidate must be able to read and write in English.
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Solid team player with a positive attitude to learning and executing.
Fresh graduates or under-graduate candidates are encouraged to apply.
Candidates must be Malaysian citizen.
Benefits:
Basic allowance RM800 to RM1,000.
2.5 working days.
Casual working environment.
Exposure to technology such as BLE, AI (GPT bot), GPS tracking, etc.
Well performed intern will be awarded with permanent position (Junior Software Engineer).

Title: Technical Support Engineer (M365)
Full Job Description:
COMPANY DESCRIPTION
Beyondsoft (listed by the Shenzhen Stock Exchange, stock code 002649) is a global provider of IT consulting, product and solution services. Relying on strong R&D and innovation capabilities, the company widely adopts emerging technologies based on big data and mobile internet, including big data management platform, enterprise risk warning and public opinion monitoring system, AI-based intelligent operation and maintenance service, and intelligent automated test products. And a wide range of products and solutions, including internationally authoritative software testing qualification training, for a wide range of services in the fields of high technology, internet, finance, retail, logistics, energy, manufacturing, and medical.
For more information, please visit www.beyondsoft.com
RESPONSIBILITIES
Microsoft 365 Support: Provide technical support and assistance to end-users on Microsoft 365 applications and services, including Outlook, Exchange Online, SharePoint, OneDrive, and Teams.
Issue Resolution: Troubleshoot and resolve Microsoft 365-related problems, including email configuration issues, access problems, and application errors, either remotely or on-site as necessary.
User Account Management: Assist with user account provisioning, modification, and deprovisioning in Microsoft 365, ensuring proper access and permissions.
Email Configuration: Configure and troubleshoot email clients (e.g., Outlook, mobile devices) for Microsoft 365 email services.
Security and Compliance: Implement and enforce security best practices, including email security, data loss prevention (DLP), and email encryption.
Documentation: Create and maintain technical documentation, including knowledge base articles and user guides related to Microsoft 365.
Training: Provide training and guidance to end-users on Microsoft 365 applications and features to enhance productivity.
Patch and Update Management: Keep Microsoft 365 services up-to-date by applying patches and updates as needed.
Reporting: Generate and analyze reports on Microsoft 365 usage, security incidents, and compliance.
Collaboration: Collaborate with other IT teams to integrate Microsoft 365 services with other systems and applications.
Vendor Coordination: Interact with Microsoft support and vendors to resolve escalated technical issues.
Continuous Learning: Stay current with Microsoft 365 updates, features, and best practices
QUALIFICATIONS
Possess at least a Diploma in a related field (e.g., Computer Science, Information Technology) or equivalent work experience.
Minimum of 2 years of experience in technical support, with a focus on Microsoft 365.
Strong knowledge of Microsoft 365 applications and services, including Exchange Online, SharePoint, OneDrive, Teams, and Office applications.
Familiar with Microsoft 365 administration and user management.
Experience in troubleshooting Microsoft 365-related issues, including email configuration and access problems.
Knowledge of email security, DLP, and encryption best practices.
Proficiency in configuring and troubleshooting email clients (Outlook, mobile devices) for Microsoft 365.
Strong problem-solving and communication skills.
Ability to work collaboratively in a team and independently when required.
Microsoft certifications related to Microsoft 365 (e.g., Microsoft 365 Certified: Modern Desktop Administrator Associate) are advantageous.
IT certifications such as CompTIA A+ or CompTIA Network+ are a plus.

Title: Software Engineer
Full Job Description:
Company Overview
At Motorola Solutions, we're guided by a shared purpose - helping people be their best in the moments that matter - and we live up to our purpose every day by solving for safer. Because people can only be their best when they not only feel safe, but are safe. We're solving for safer by building the best possible technologies across every part of our safety and security ecosystem. That's mission -critical communications devices and networks, AI-powered video security & access control and the ability to unite voice, video and data in a single command center view. We're solving for safer by connecting public safety agencies and enterprises, enabling the collaboration that's critical to connect those in need with those who can help. The work we do here matters.
Department Overview
Designs and develops firmware for body-worn-cameras for law enforcement as well as commercial sectors. Opportunity for cross-site collaboration. The team promotes a happy and holistic work experience.
Job Description
·       Design, develop and maintain firmware for body-worn-camera, including requirement gathering, implementation, develop unit test and end-to-end verification.
·       Troubleshoot & debugging skills on embedded systems.
·       Identify opportunities for efficiency improvement and cost savings, including streamlining development process and FW architecture in long run.
Basic Requirements
·       Bachelor / Master degree in Computer Engineering, Software Engineering. Having a EE background is a plus.
·       Experience in writing quality C or Modern C++ on Linux OS based embedded systems. Experience in Rust is a plus.
·       Experience in the Linux build system. Familar with Yocto is a plus.
·       Kknowledge in writing low level programming for HW peripherals and drivers.
·       Knowledge on networking protocols / connectivity, such as Wifi, Bluetooth, used with embedded systems.
·       Knowledge in camera linux embedded system is a plus.
·       Knowledge in ONVIF, camera controller, camera imaging pipeline is a plus.
·       Good in written in English and oral communication skills.
·       Experience in communicating with technical and non-technical stakeholders.
·       Desire to learn.
·       A team player.
Travel Requirements
None
Relocation Provided
None
Position Type
New Grad
Referral Payment Plan
No
EEO Statement
Motorola Solutions is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion or belief, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, veteran status or any other legally-protected characteristic.
We are proud of our people-first and community-focused culture, empowering every Motorolan to be their most authentic self and to do their best work to deliver on the promise of a safer world. ohr@motorolasolutions.com

Title: Senior Embedded Engineer
Full Job Description:
Company Overview
At Motorola Solutions, we're guided by a shared purpose - helping people be their best in the moments that matter - and we live up to our purpose every day by solving for safer. Because people can only be their best when they not only feel safe, but are safe. We're solving for safer by building the best possible technologies across every part of our safety and security ecosystem. That's mission -critical communications devices and networks, AI-powered video security & access control and the ability to unite voice, video and data in a single command center view. We're solving for safer by connecting public safety agencies and enterprises, enabling the collaboration that's critical to connect those in need with those who can help. The work we do here matters.
Department Overview
The Video Embedded Software Engineering Team at Motorola Solutions (MSI) delivers firmware for embedded devices such as in-car video systems, fixed video and body worn cameras. Working in close collaboration with other departments, engineers in this team excel at developing applications and drivers under Linux, and have a variety of backgrounds and specializations. The team uses modern C++ to develop highly reusable code, and utilize state-of-the-art systems and tools throughout the development life cycle
Job Description
• Motorola Solutions engineer design mission-critical communications products and services to public safety and commercial customers around the world.
• As software platform engineer, you will work on Linux Platform, device driver, Filesystem, boot sequence and platform porting for custom hardware Optimize Linux kernel for performance.
• Full involvement in software development cycle including specification definition, architecture design, implementation, testing and review.
• A Development Team member in Agile Scrum team.
• Innovative and versatile engineer who embraces new technology challenges.
Basic Requirements
Master’s/Bachelor’s Degree in Computer/Electronic/Telecommunications Engineering or Computer Science
Understand the fundamental structure of Embedded Linux kernel from the perspective of porting a Linux based Operating System execution environment over some standard hardware platforms including board bring up and manage the execution of Embedded Applications
Proficient in different device driver framework of Linux
Understand management of memory resources in Linux Kernel, interrupt handling, event handling and synchronization mechanism in Linux, Linux Kernel sub system infrastructure, Management of CPU resource, file system and file resources in Linux Kernel.
More than 3 years of working experience
Excellent in C/C++ programming
Experience in handling test equipment eg oscilloscope
Understanding of processor and hardware requirements around embedded Linux
Experience creating and implementing automated tests at the unit, integration and performance levels
Some experience with Git, JIRA, Continuous integration and Agile software development methods.

None

None

Experienced

No

Title: Basic [Below RM 12000] Mandarin Speaking Business Development Manager - PJ
Account Manager
Full Job Description:
In our 'always on' world, we believe it's essential to have a genuine connection with the work you do.
CommScope is a global leader in infrastructure solutions, renowned for our innovative structured cabling technologies. We empower Building & Campus, Broadband, and Data Centres to thrive in an increasingly connected world. Our Data Center (DC) business, encompassing MTDC, Hyperscale, AI DC, Cloud, Central Office, and Enterprise DC, is at the forefront of supporting the explosive growth driven by cloud computing, Hyperscalers, and Generative AI.
We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Data Center Account Manager to drive our expansion in the vibrant Malaysian market. Based in Kuala Lumpur or Johor, you will play a pivotal role in shaping the future of datacentre infrastructure.
How You'll Help Us Connect the World:
As a trusted advisor, you will be responsible for promoting and selling CommScope's cutting-edge passive network infrastructure solutions to datacentre clients across Malaysia. Your mission will be to:
Cultivate and expand client relationships: Build strong, lasting partnerships with key decision-makers in the datacentre ecosystem.
Identify and capitalize on new business opportunities: Proactively seek out and develop new avenues for growth.
Understand and address client needs: Analyze client business, technology, and product requirements to provide tailored solutions.
Drive revenue and achieve sales targets: Manage the sales pipeline, forecast demand, and close deals effectively.
Lead strategic account and project planning: Develop and execute comprehensive plans to ensure project success.
Become a subject matter expert: Stay abreast of the latest datacentre trends and technologies to provide expert guidance.
Required Qualifications for Consideration:
Proven track record: 10+ years of experience in building and maintaining relationships within the datacentre market, consistently exceeding sales targets.
"Hunter" mentality: A proactive, results-driven approach with a focus on direct engagement with end-users (datacentres).
Exceptional interpersonal skills: Ability to forge strong partnerships with consultants, integrators, installers, and general contractors.
Strategic ownership: Serve as the primary driver of commercial strategy for key datacentre accounts in Malaysia.
Deep industry knowledge: Comprehensive understanding of datacentre demand drivers, buying cycles, and emerging technologies.
Influence and leadership: Ability to motivate, influence, and build trust with stakeholders at all levels.
Superior organizational skills: Proven ability to manage multiple priorities and tasks effectively.
What Happens After You Apply:
Why CommScope?
CommScope is on a quest to deliver connectivity that empowers how we live, work, and learn. Our employees push the boundaries of communications technology that enables groundbreaking discoveries like 5G, the Internet of Things, and gigabit speeds for everyone, everywhere. With our unmatched expertise in copper, fiber, and wireless infrastructure, our global clients rely on us to outperform today and be ready for the needs of tomorrow.
If you want to grow your career alongside forward-thinking, hardworking, and caring people who strive to create what's next…..come connect to your future at CommScope.
CommScope is an Equal Opportunity Employer (EEO), including people with disabilities and veterans. If you are seeking an accommodation for the application or interview process, please contact us to submit your request at
talentacquisition@commscope.com
.
#LI-GF1
